europeana:record.dc:title: Revisionary notes on Bentonia van Achterberg, 1992 (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Orgilinae) with description of two new species
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Braet Y.
Tignon M.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Braconidae
Orgilinae
Bentonia
Peru
Mexico
Venezuela
key
europeana:record.dc:description: Two new species of the genus Bentonia van Achterberg, 1992 (Braconidae: Orgilinae) (B. inca from Peru and B. xochiquetzalis from Mexico) are described and partly illustrated. A third undescribed species was found for which some characters are listed. The distribution of B. scutellaris van Achterberg, 1992, is extended west to Peru and B. longicornis van Achterberg, 1992, north to Venezuela. An identification key is added.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Revisionary notes on Bentonia van Achterberg, 1992 (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Orgilinae) with description of two new species (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 72, 1-10)
